column2: question
column5: I find it hard to know what is true and what is false about Coronavirus
column6: I am trying to avoid news about Coronavirus
column7: The mainstream media is exaggerating the seriousness of Coronavirus
column8: This crisis is showing some positive sides of society (e.g. more local/community spirit, support for NHS)
column9: I am confused about what I should be doing in response to Coronavirus
